channel.title: Mathematics on Zenith John's Nonsense

item.title: Mathematics Notes
item.description: General Mathematics Flavors of mathematics [2021-10-15 Fri 17:44] I want to quote the word of Charles Fefferman to show my flavors of mathematics. Mathematics at the highest level has several flavors. On seeing it, one might say What amazing technical power! What a grand synthesis! How could anyone not have seen this before? Where on earth did this come from? In my opinion, the proof of Fermat’s last theorem by
